title: Sufganiot
ingredients: ['2 1/2 teaspoons dried active baking yeast', '4 tablespoons caster sugar, divided', '180ml warm milk (45 degrees C)', '300g plain flour', '2 egg yolks', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '30g butter, softened', '500ml vegetable oil', '60g icing sugar', 'Filling', '100g drained cottage cheese', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '160g preserves of choice']
